SEC Mutual Fund Search

SEC Mutual Fund Search

fund_search(term)

Arguments

term

Search term to look for funds

Value

A dataframe of funds found including the following columns -

  • class_id

  • class_filings_href

  • class_name

  • class_ticker

  • series_id

  • series_filings_href

  • series_name

  • series_funds_href

  • cik

  • cik_name

  • cik_filings_href

  • cik_funds_href

Examples

fund_search("precious metals")
#>      class_id
#> 1  C000000347
#> 2  C000000348
#>                                                                       class_filings_href
#> 1  https://www.sec.gov/cgi-bin/browse-edgar?CIK=C000000347&action=getcompany&scd=filings
#> 2  https://www.sec.gov/cgi-bin/browse-edgar?CIK=C000000348&action=getcompany&scd=filings
#>                                                     class_name class_ticker
#> 1                                                      Class A        IGDAX
#> 2                                                      Class B        IGDBX
#>     series_id
#> 1  S000000157
#> 2  S000000157
#>                                                                      series_filings_href
#> 1  https://www.sec.gov/cgi-bin/browse-edgar?CIK=S000000157&action=getcompany&scd=filings
#> 2  https://www.sec.gov/cgi-bin/browse-edgar?CIK=S000000157&action=getcompany&scd=filings
#>                                                    series_name
#> 1                          INVESCO Gold & Precious Metals Fund
#> 2                          INVESCO Gold & Precious Metals Fund
#>    series_funds_href        cik
#> 1               <NA> 0000725781
#> 2               <NA> 0000725781
#>                                                             cik_name
#> 1                            AIM SECTOR FUNDS (INVESCO SECTOR FUNDS)
#> 2                            AIM SECTOR FUNDS (INVESCO SECTOR FUNDS)
#>                                                             cik_filings_href
#> 1  https://www.sec.gov/cgi-bin/browse-edgar?CIK=0000725781&action=getcompany
#> 2  https://www.sec.gov/cgi-bin/browse-edgar?CIK=0000725781&action=getcompany
#>                                                                          cik_funds_href
#> 1  https://www.sec.gov/cgi-bin/browse-edgar?CIK=0000725781&action=getcompany&scd=series
#> 2  https://www.sec.gov/cgi-bin/browse-edgar?CIK=0000725781&action=getcompany&scd=series
#>  [ reached getOption("max.print") -- omitted 78 rows ]
